props.title: Current connections
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.currentConnections`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Total operations per second
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.totalOperationsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Read rate per second
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.readRatePerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Read operations per second
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.readOperationsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Write rate per second
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.writeRatePerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Write operations per second
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.writeOperationsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Memory usage
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.memoryUsedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Quota utilization
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.quotaUtilization`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Disk usage
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.diskUsedInBytes`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Disk write queue
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.diskWriteQueue`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Out of memory errors per second
props.query: SELECT average(`couchbase.bucket.outOfMemoryErrorsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
